title: Primary Two Thematic Curriculum Syllabus
description: The P2 Thematic Curriculum organizes learning around 12 themes central to children's experiences and interests. Each theme integrates multiple learning areas including Mathematics, English, Science, Social Studies, and other subjects, promoting holistic child development.

themes.name: Our School and Neighbourhood
themes.description: Children learn about their immediate school and community environment

themes.name: Our Home and Community
themes.description: Focus on family structures and community relationships

themes.name: The Human Body and Health
themes.description: Understanding the body and promoting health and wellness

themes.name: Food and Nutrition
themes.description: Learning about food sources and balanced nutrition

themes.name: Accidents and Safety
themes.description: Promoting safety awareness and prevention strategies

themes.name: Work and Livelihoods
themes.description: Understanding different occupations and economic activities

themes.name: Child Protection
themes.description: Developing awareness of rights and personal safety

themes.name: Time and Seasons
themes.description: Understanding time, seasons, and weather patterns

themes.name: Water and Cleanliness
themes.description: Appreciating water resources and promoting hygiene

special_features: Thematic organization linking multiple subject areas
Emphasis on literacy and mathematics skills
Use of first/familiar language for instruction
Integration of life skills and values
Inclusive approach for all learners including those with special needs
